short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix Copy Link Address in Googleâ€™s search results - both regular and image search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just install it, no configuration is necessary.

Works for regular web search as well as image search - both ordinary and IPv6 version.

Source code: https://github.com/mrcz/re-direct

Changelog:

1.3.1.1    Fixed missing css file

1.2.1.0    Updated the list of google search domains
